answers.answer: could you post the ref ranges?your tsh and free t4 look decent.  your free t3 looks low, but i'm not sure without ref ranges.

Hi,Thanks for the reply. Sorry that i just saw it.I went for a thyroid test and these are the only information i obtained. What is ref ranges?thanks a lot for the reply...hope to get yr reply soon.mun ee

question: My test resultsTSH----------2.14 mU/LT3, Free-----0.35 ng/dlT4, Free----1.2 ng/dlis tat normal....i hv been taking OCP for a year time, will it affect the test result?I am a bit worry....it seems like i got the symptoms that shown i m havin hypothyroidism....cold intoleranceCeliac disease - sprueGestational diabetesLactose intoleranceweight gain, hard to lose weight even though i went through slimming programabnormal menstrual cycle, heavy menstrualmuscle cramps sometimeseasily feel upset, mood swing easily...kind of depressionitchy, dry, sensitive skinpaleness sometimespls give me some advices...thanks alot.
title: hypothyroidism worries
